name: Hyperoll
description:
A top-down shooter where you are armed with a bow and have to survive against waves of enemies, but with a simple twist, every time you roll you can obtain a relic, and decide to keep or reRoll it.

The art style and gameplay are heavily inspired by other games.

Features
  • Smooth Top-Down controls
  • Bow and Arrow combat
  • Collect different Relics (not Implemented)   
  • Build your character how you want (not Implemented)
Controls
  • WASD to Move
  • Mouse to Aim
  • Space to Roll
  • E to acquire Relic (not Implemented)
  • Tab to open Relic window (not Implemented)

This was a short game made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam with the theme: Roll of the Dice.
